channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress File Upload
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress File Upload

item.title: CVE-2024-6651|2024-08-06T14:52:56.919Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20file%20upload
item.description: The WordPress File Upload WordPress plugin before 4.24.8 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin

item.title: CVE-2024-6651|2024-08-06T06:00:02.684Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20file%20upload
item.description: The WordPress File Upload WordPress plugin before 4.24.8 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin
